name: Southwestern Salad
ingredients: 1/3 c. chopped cilantro 1/2 c. lime juice
1/2 c. olive oil 1/2 c. sour cream
steps: Process all of the above ingredients in a blender
The remaining ingredients can be adjusted according to your liking.
Romaine lettuce Cheese -­‐ Mexican blend or Colby
Blue corn tortilla chips Black Olives
